text: Dherai jaso ahale kitabaharu (yahudi isa'ile) satya prakata bha'isakepachi pani aphna hrdayama isrya bha'eko karana timila'i pani imanabata vicalita gara'una cahanchan. Timi pani ksama gara ra bevasta garide'u, yahamsam'ma ki allahale aphno (arko) adesa patha'os, nihsandeha allaha hareka kuramathi samarthavana cha
